attributes.action: make Mr Amit Rathod prime minister
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Mr Amit Rathod wants the chance to run for prime minister he feels he has what it takes to make this country a better place with all the terror happening in this world. Mr amit rathod thinks he would take this country to a better place and help the world through poverty. He would deeply appreciate this.

thankyou

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
